title: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
bullets: Graduated with a 3.6/4 GPA in a rigorous, research-focused AI curriculum.
Served as Teaching Assistant for Machine Learning and Reinforcement Learning, mentoring students on production-minded model design.
Built deep expertise in Deep Reinforcement Learning, Computer Vision, and large-scale ML systems.
Developed a strong foundation in turning theory into deployable, real-world solutions.

title: B. Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
bullets: Graduated with a 9.05/10 CGPA in a core computer science program.
Built strong fundamentals in algorithms, data structures, and software engineering principles.
Developed early interest in scalable systems, databases, and applied AI.
Established the engineering discipline that later shaped large-scale data and ML platforms.
